name: Harvest Time (itch)
description:
In a far off land where leaves turn from green to crimson...a strange, chill mist creeps over the land and the nights grow ever longer.

On a small farm near a forgotten village, a lone farmer hears a strange pounding on his door as the sun sets.

Welcome to Harvest Time! This is a short horror-esque farming simulation/RPG game. Find the seeds, farm your crops, fight monsters in the Dark Wood...and most importantly stay out of the sun!

This game was made for the Spooktober Spooktacular Game Jam on RPG Maker Forums.
